Text:
This is a shockingly ignorant justification for the indefensible aggression and horrific ethnic cleansing conducted by Serbian troops during 1980s.

Racist and xenophobic to the extreme, this could have been a primer for Adolf Hitler --  except the "book" is as delusional as the "description" and "review" above.

Recommended for Ku Klux Klan and all White Supremicists. FIGHT MONGRELIZATION OF "OUR" CIVILIZATION!
